entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
